description: '''Mohit Chauhan''' (born 11 March 1966) is an Indian playback singer, known for his work in [[Hindi]] films. He was a part of the [[Silk Route (band)|Silk Route]] band. Chauhan has received two [[Filmfare Award for Best Male Playback Singer]] and three [[Zee Cine Award for Best Playback Singer â€“ Male|Zee Cine Award For Best Male Playback Singer]] awards. He has recorded several songs for films and albums many different languages, and is one of the most prominent [[Indi-pop|Indipop]] singers.
